name: The Thirteenth Colony
description:
Don’t wanna read our cool intro? Skip it and play the game here!

Intro

Question: How many space colonists does it take to keep the human race from becoming extinct?

Answer: …well, probably more than we have.

The 13th Colony is a game about the last vestiges of humanity. Earth is toast, and you’re the Exploration Lieutenant for the very last Mission to Planet Kepler-22b.

Can you find the resources you need to keep the base from breaking down? Or at least… delay it?

Can you discover what happened to colonies 1-12?

Features Gather Resources to Keep Your Base Alive!

Traverse the Alien Planet in Your Car!!

Explore 3 Different Biomes!

Discover All 12 (Other) Colonies! Avoid Alien Monsters!

Read Tons of Story! Hang With a Big Cast of Characters!

Randomly Generated Worlds - Non-Zero Replayability Value!

Meta

Although this is a jam game, all code, assets, and music were created from scratch (compo rules):

Code: bkelly

Art: kristinamay (in Pixaki)

Music: kristinamay (in Medley)

Writing: kristinamay + Fletcher (thanks for the help!)

Thanks a bundle for giving our game a try - we worked so hard on it and are excited to see what you all discover on Kepple-B!

Whoops!

There might be a few things we didn’t get a chance to finish or polish as much as we’d like. If you get a message on-screen that doesn’t totally make sense, that’s why. It’s definitely playable to the end (there are several different endings!), but any “TODO”s you see (hopefully you won’t!) are an artifact of our being quite ambitious with this game.

WHERE TO PLAY

You can play the game here! It's hosted on github pages, not on Itch.
